item.title: Erik Satie - Vexations (1894)
item.description: First recording, 6 hours (2017) During my Junior year of high school, I recorded a 6-hour performance of Erik Satie's Vexations.

item.title: Charlie 'the Traveling Salesman' on the MBTA
item.description: Using a brute force Traveling Salesman search of the MBTA Green Line, I found the shortest possible route which visits all 64 stops. The ideal time was about 3 hours. In practice, my best time is 3:15.
